sentences.en: He could always hustle a buck or two from some sucker.
sentences.cn: 他总能从傻瓜身上弄到一两块钱.

sentences.en: I don't want to hustle you into a decision.
I hate all the hustle ( and bustle ) of Saturday shopping.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌星期六买东西那 麽 挤来挤去的.

sentences.en: If a poet is divorced from the hustle and bustle of life, he can't write inspiring poetry.
sentences.cn: 若是离开了沸腾的生活, 诗人是写不出感人的诗篇的.

sentences.en: If you're going to be ready in time, you'd better hustle.
sentences.cn: 如果你要及时做好准备, 那你最好快点.

sentences.en: It seems that he enjoys the hustle and bustle of life in the big city.
sentences.cn: 看起来他似乎很喜欢大城市的热闹繁忙的生活。

sentences.en: Jenny was exhausted by the hustle of city life.
sentences.cn: 珍妮被城市生活的忙乱弄得筋疲力尽.

sentences.en: She waited until they were beyond the hustle of the Washington Saturday night traffic.
sentences.cn: 她一直等到他们远离了华盛顿周六晚上的车水马龙。
他们中间一些人强卖土产品.

sentences.en: The guards hustled Harry out of the car.
sentences.cn: 卫兵们把哈里从车子里拉了出来。

sentences.en: the hustle and bustle of the marketplace
The railway station was a scene of hustle and bustle.
sentences.cn: 火车站是拥挤喧嚷之所.

sentences.en: They recognize that hustle and rush are the allies of superficiality.
sentences.cn: 他们认识到匆忙草率就会促成肤浅片面.

sentences.en: This place is very quiet, quite different from the hustle and bustle of the cities.
sentences.cn: 这个地方很安静, 与城市的拥挤喧嚣十分不同.

sentences.en: We can get there in time if we hustle.
sentences.cn: 要是我们赶紧些,可以准时到那儿.

sentences.en: We need to hustle if we’re going to make this flight.
sentences.cn: 要想搭乘这趟班机，我们得抓紧时间。

sentences.en: We're expected to hustle and fight for what we want.
sentences.cn: 我们应该为得到自己想要的而不择手段，奋力争取。

sentences.en: You'll have to hustle if you're to get home for supper.
sentences.cn: 你想赶回家吃晚饭的话，就得加快速度。

trans.tran_cn: 忙碌，奔忙，挤，推，拥挤喧嚷
催促，赶紧做；猛推，挤，强迫
trans.tran_en: to make someone move quickly, especially by pushing them roughly

trans.tran_cn: 赶紧，硬挤过去，拼命挣钱
催促，硬挤，乱推，硬逼，逼使，强夺
